quotes.message: Look, we are human, we make mistakes. I will gladly shout from the rooftops that I am not perfect. Nor will I ever be.
quotes.name: Dianna Agron

quotes.message: Life's not perfect. Some loose ends may never get trimmed up and tidied.
quotes.name: Hoda Kotb

quotes.message: I know I'm not perfect & will never become. Yet, I'm proud of being Me, with all humility & imperfections. Cause this is the only life I have.
quotes.name: Abu Sufyan ibn Harb

quotes.message: No one is perfect in this world. Forgive people for not knowing better and learn to move on.
quotes.name: Leon Brown

quotes.message: I'm not perfect, but if there are any points given for caring about people with every fiber of your being and giving life all you've got every day, then I suppose I have a shot.
quotes.name: Jack Welch

quotes.message: People are not perfect... very often the relationships that are strongest are those where people have worked through big crises, but they've had to work through them. So the challenge to us is to work through that.
quotes.name: Patricia Hewitt

quotes.message: I'm not perfect, but those flaws make an interesting person.
quotes.name: Mary Frann

quotes.message: Maybe you're not perfect, but you're willing to actually look at yourself and take some kind of accountability. That's a change. It might not mean that you can turn everything around, but I think there's something incredibly hopeful about that.
quotes.name: Brie Larson

quotes.message: Warriors of light are not perfect.Their beauty lies in accepting this fact and still desiring to grow and to learn.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: But I am not perfect in my way of putting things Because I lack the divine simplicity Of being only what I appear to be.
quotes.name: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.message: I'm not perfect, but I'd like to be perfect. I'm working on it.
quotes.name: Shelley Long

quotes.message: I understand that I'm not perfect. I made mistakes and I had a hand in everything that's happened to me, good and bad.
quotes.name: Dwyane Wade

quotes.message: I'm not perfect. But I am trying every day to concentrate on being better.
quotes.name: Allen Iverson

quotes.message: I make mistakes every day. I'm not perfect in my behavior, but I want to be and that's what God is after, a heart that wants to be.
quotes.name: Joyce Meyer

quotes.message: All that is not perfect down to the smallest detail is doomed to perish.
quotes.name: Gustav Mahler

quotes.message: The living is not perfect because it is liable to change; the dead is not perfect because it does not live.
quotes.name: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.message: I know who I am. I am not perfect. I'm not the most beautiful woman in the world. But I'm one of them.
quotes.name: Mary J. Blige

quotes.message: I'm not perfect. And who knows how many times I've fallen short. We all fall short. That's the amazing thing about the grace of God.
quotes.name: Tim Tebow

quotes.message: I will make mistakes, after all I am not perfect, but I will do my best to make them up to you. I would never hurt you intentionally. I would not give up on you, so I hope you don't give up on me. Sincerely, The Person that Loves You.
quotes.name: Carlos Salinas

quotes.message: The most beautiful things are not perfect, they are special.
quotes.name: Bob Marley

quotes.message: I may not be perfect but I am perfect enough to be a very good rendition of me.
quotes.name: Jan Hellriegel

quotes.message: I'm not perfect; no one is perfect. Everyone makes mistakes. I think you try to learn from those mistakes.
quotes.name: Derek Jeter

quotes.message: People are good or half good or a quarter good, and it changes all the time- but even on the best day nobody's perfect.
quotes.name: Colum Mccann

quotes.message: Nobody's perfect. We're all just one step up from the beasts and one step down from the angels.
quotes.name: Jeannette Walls

quotes.message: I love what I do, and I always make sure to tell my fans I'm not perfect, so don't think I am. I make mistakes. I'm human, and we all are. But I try to be the best I can be, and that's all I really can do.
quotes.name: Selena Gomez

quotes.message: Every day is not perfect. You have your bad days and good days just like anyone else. You do not want to talk to people sometimes. It is normal.
quotes.name: Brett Favre

quotes.message: We're not perfect; we all have things that people might not like to see, and I like to show my faults.
quotes.name: Grace Jones

quotes.message: Everybody's got regrets. Everybody's made mistakes. Nobody's perfect.
quotes.name: Josh Duhamel

quotes.message: I am not a perfect friend, and it is impossible not to rebuff or be rebuffed if you move about the world.
quotes.name: Anne Roiphe

quotes.message: I'm not perfect but I'm learning to be better.
quotes.name: Ronnie Radke

quotes.message: Because I'm not perfect looking, I get to play better roles.
quotes.name: Juliette Lewis

quotes.message: All confidence placed in another is dangerous if it is not perfect, for on almost all occasions we ought to tell everything or to conceal everything. We have already told too much of our secret, if one single circumstance is to be kept back.
quotes.name: Jean de la Bruyère

quotes.message: Baseball is a game of life. It's not perfect, but it feels like it is.
quotes.name: Joe Torre

quotes.message: I'm not perfect in my walk but I want to do the right thing.
quotes.name: Kirk Cameron

quotes.message: I see conflict. But the conflict is what makes it relatable. I'm conflicted; you're conflicted. I'm not perfect - nobody is. I'm just blessed to be able to express my conflict through song.
quotes.name: Kendrick Lamar

quotes.message: What happened in my personal life affected my career too. I am not perfect and I have made a lot of mistakes. Being an entrepreneur is incredibly lonely. There were many hurdles along the way. From starting out, to making it, and almost losing it, to fighting back, to nearly losing it all again. There have been extreme highs and extreme lows.
quotes.name: Michelle Mone

quotes.message: I'm not perfect, but I think that I've done good to stay focused on what I'm called to do.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: It was not perfect but I'm very happy. It could have been better, but I'm now looking forward to my second race of the season.
quotes.name: Usain Bolt

quotes.message: I will be the first to admit I am not perfect and I make mistakes.
quotes.name: Alberto Gonzales

quotes.message: I'm not perfect, but I believe my faith in Jesus Christ will really take me far in the world!
quotes.name: Christina Grimmie

quotes.message: It's okay that we're not perfect. It's okay that we all have problems. It's okay to cry, to show emotions.
quotes.name: Marina Abramovic

quotes.message: A woman's life is not perfect or whole till she has added herself to a husband. Nor is a man's life perfect or whole till he has added to himself a wife.
quotes.name: Anthony Trollope

quotes.message: Most of our ancestors were not perfect ladies and gentlemen. The majority of them weren't even mammals.
quotes.name: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.message: Nobody has a perfect anything. We don't have perfect lives. We're not perfect beings.
quotes.name: Gladys Knight

quotes.message: I don't have to be perfect. All I have to do is show up and enjoy the messy, imperfect and beautiful journey of my life.
quotes.name: Kerry Washington

quotes.message: I'm the most chill person I know...I'm happy with myself...I'm not perfect, but I'm cool with that.
quotes.name: Freddie Prinze Jr.

quotes.message: Judge not, before you judge yourself. . Judge not, if you're not ready for judgment. . The road of life is rocky and you may stumble too, . So while you talk about me, someone else is judging you.
quotes.name: Bob Marley

quotes.message: To banish imperfection is to destroy expression, to check exertion, to paralyze vitality.
quotes.name: John Ruskin

quotes.message: We are all wonderful, beautiful wrecks. That's what connects us--that we're all broken, all beautifully imperfect.
quotes.name: Emilio Estevez

quotes.message: Life is not always perfect. Like a road, it has many bends, ups and down, but that’s its beauty.
quotes.name: Amit Ray

quotes.message: Nothing and no one is perfect. It just takes a good eye to find those hidden imperfections.
quotes.name: Daphne Delacroix

quotes.message: No person is completely wicked, just as no person is perfect. We are all grey.
quotes.name: Sweety Shinde

quotes.message: We are all perfectly imperfect.
quotes.name: Muniba Mazari

quotes.message: I love this world because it is imperfect. It is imperfect, and that's why it is growing; if it was perfect it would have been dead.
quotes.name: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.message: Man will ever remain imperfect, and it will always be his part to try to be perfect.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Whilst we may attack measures and systems, we may not, must not, attack men. Imperfect ourselves, we must be tender toward others and be slow to impute motives.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: You come to love not by finding the perfect person, but by seeing an imperfect person perfectly.
quotes.name: Sam Keen

quotes.message: Perfect solutions of our difficulties are not to be looked for in an imperfect world.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: I always find beauty in things that are odd and imperfect - they are much more interesting.
quotes.name: Marc Jacobs

quotes.message: It is not the perfect, but the imperfect, who have need of love.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: The mere existence of conscience, that faculty of which people prate so much nowadays, and are so ignorantly proud, is a sign of our imperfect development.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: If something is going to be flawed, why not have it be interestingly flawed, as opposed to borrowingly flawed?
quotes.name: Tim Burton

quotes.message: Every single one of us is loveable just the way we are; even with our flaws and blemishes. When we truly know that, we can stop disliking aspects of ourselves and embrace our imperfections. In fact, it is often because of these flaws that we are special and unique.
quotes.name: Allen Klein

quotes.message: Imperfection is in some sort essential to all that we know of life. Nothing that lives is or can be rigidly perfect.
quotes.name: John Ruskin

quotes.message: It is only imperfection that complains of what is imperfect. The more perfect we are, the more gentle and quiet we become toward the defects of others.
quotes.name: Francois Fenelon

quotes.message: We can be aware of an imperfection without making any problem about it. In other words, the mind becomes an embracing mind.
quotes.name: Josh Bartok

quotes.message: Imperfection means perfection hid.
quotes.name: Robert Browning

quotes.message: Life does not have to be perfect to be wonderful.
quotes.name: Annette Funicello

quotes.message: I am imperfect and vulnerable but I am also brave and worthy of love and belonging.
quotes.name: Brené Brown

quotes.message: You are imperfect; permanently and inevitably flawed. And you are beautiful.
quotes.name: Amy Bloom

quotes.message: When we see someone or something as imperfect, it is a reflection of our limitations, not theirs.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli
